name: ON
description: ONLIVE is a decentralized media ecosystem developed on the Polygon blockchain. Its native asset, the ON token, functions as the primary utility within the network. The ONLIVE ecosystem will be available via both a mobile application and a web platform, introducing ON TV, a decentralized channel delivering continuous cryptocurrency news, market analysis, and financial insights. All interactions within the ecosystem are conducted in ON, ensuring a transparent, blockchain-based framework for streaming and information exchange.
